segments.text: Hi , this is Quipu Corp . Is that Miss Zhang ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . speaking . Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am calling to tell you the items you are supposed to bring for the interview the day after tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do I need to take with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'd better bring the diploma , identification card and several copies of your resume .
segments.speaker: S1
